ExportData.Statement: SELECT * FROM w2_Order, w2_OrderOwner, w2_OrderShipping, w2_OrderItem, w2_Payment, w2_ShopShipping WHERE w2_Order.shop_id = '0' AND w2_Order.order_id = w2_OrderOwner.order_id AND w2_Order.order_id = w2_OrderShipping.order_id AND w2_Order.order_id = w2_OrderItem.order_id AND w2_Order.shop_id = w2_Payment.shop_id AND w2_Order.order_payment_kbn = w2_Payment.payment_id AND w2_Order.shop_id = w2_ShopShipping.shop_id AND w2_Order.shipping_id = w2_ShopShipping.shipping_id AND (w2_Order.order_payment_kbn = 'K10' OR w2_Order.order_payment_kbn = 'K20') -- 代引きとクレジット決済のみ出力 --AND (w2_Order.order_date = GETDATE())
